parameters.name: HostAccountName
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: HostId
parameters.description: The ID of the host for which the host accounts were queried.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The total number of host accounts returned.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The ID of the user for which you want to query authorized host accounts.

>  You can call the [ListUsers](~~204522~~) operation to query the ID of the user ID.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The name of the host account that you want to query. Exact match is supported.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The name of the host account.

parameters.name: UserId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the Bastionhost instance where you want to query the host accounts that the user is authorized to manage on the host.

>  For more information about the mapping between region IDs and region names, see [Regions and zones](~~40654~~).
